page.title: 11Churches in Tring
page.content: The Parish Church in the High Street is a very big church and every Sunday people go there. It is very big inside and it is very tall. My mum and dad got married in it. Little babies can be christened there. The Catholic Church is a bit smaller but a lot of people go there.It is in Langdon St. There are three Baptist Churches one in New Rd and Akeman St and last of all the High St. The one in New Rd is where I go to Girls Club. There is one Methodist church, it is in Chapel St.It is small and people go there to pray every Sunday.
